description:
Embrace your daily life adventure with Vessi! Visit http://vessi.com/LinusTechTips for an automatic 15% off your first purchase at checkout!

Check out the Corsair 3500X at: https://lmg.gg/3500X

Karaoke is fun. For some people. But I don't want to cram myself into a tiny room where everything is too loud. But sometimes, you gotta do what makes people happy. So we started on a search to find the best at home karaoke solutions, and we think we found some decent options. But the search wasn't easy. 

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1586352-my-kids-want-a-karaoke-setup/

title: I love my kids, but I HATE Karaoke.
